description: This cheese platter recipe is perfect for entertaining. It's easy to put together and features five varieties of cheeses with a range of tasty pairings.
name: The Perfect Cheese Platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 170g Thomas Dux hommus with roasted garlic & truffle oil dip
150g Thomas Dux black & green olives with orange & coriander
170g Thomas Dux basil pesto with grana padano & roasted cashew dip
1 rosemary sprig, cut into smaller sprigs
150g Thomas Dux Spanish truffle sheep’s cheese
130g Woolworths artisan style seeds & grains crispbread
0.5 loaf crafted bakery dark rye sourdough, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place hommus in a small serving bowl. Drizzle with oil and season with pepper. Place olives, cucumbers and pesto dip in separate small serving bowls. Place blackberries on a small plate and scatter with rosemary sprigs.
Place hommus and salami on a small serving board. Place brie, sheep’s cheese and olives on a separate small serving board.
Arrange blue cheese, cheddars, cucumbers, pesto dip, apricots and walnuts on a large serving platter. Garnish with thyme and dill. Serve with crispbread, bread and blackberries.
